channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The Designer Who Presented the iPhone Air to the World Has Left Apple, Report Says
item.description: He's at an AI startup now, according to "people familiar with the move."

item.title: The Final ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ Trailer Is as Dazzling as Ever
item.description: In case you needed one more reason to see 'Avatar: Fire and Ash,' Disney's got one last trailer to sell you.

item.title: Why Google’s smarter weather might be the most useful AI in your life
item.description: Google’s new WeatherNext 2 AI system brings smarter, faster, and more nuanced weather forecasting directly to your apps and daily decisions.

item.title: Exclusive: Grab the Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones (2nd Gen) for the lowest price this Black Friday using our coupon code
item.description: The second-generation Bose QuietComfort Ultra Headphones are simply stunning for music, noise cancellation and comfort. Our exclusive discount code brings them down to a more accessible price this Black Friday.

item.title: Keen to get into VR? The Meta Quest 3S just hit a new Australian all-time low price for Black Friday
item.description: The Meta Quest 3S is a fantastic VR headset for anyone on a tighter budget and it's now more affordable than ever thanks to this attractive Black Friday deal.

item.title: Apple shuts AI out: iOS apps just got more private
item.description: Apple's latest App Store fix shuts third-party AI out of iOS apps. Here's why.
